title: Where Dragons Rule
description: For the Princess Sharlin the awakening of the dragons brings a promise of only with the powers of the pregnant Dragon Queen Turiana can Sharlin return home and lead her people to victory over the evil sorceress. But first Sharlin and her battle-companion, the commoner Dar, must fight the terrible witchking Valorek. And with Turiana's help they will succeed if they can accomplish the go back in time to save a people whose defeat is already etched in stone. But they must also race against time. For Turiana is almost ready to spawn her eggs..almost ready to die.
author: Rhondi A. Vilott Salsitz
